short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Kindle Mystery Books, Free Nook Mystery Books and Free Kobo Mystery Books are directly in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Free! 

'Free Mystery Books' brings you the best free Kindle Mystery Books, the best free Nook Mystery books and the best free Kobo Mystery books 

Note: You'll need the separate Kindle, Nook and Kobo Apps to read the books. 

'Free Mystery Books' brings you - 

1) The very best free kindle mystery books each day. 

2) The very best nook free mystery books every few days. 

3) The very best kobo free mystery books every few days. 

4) Hand-curated selections - books with good reviews. 

Note: You MUST check the prices at the Amazon and B&N websites BEFORE buying the book. Please check the prices at the website. Prices change all the time. The Amazon and B&N websites are the only final price reference. 

Note: Only Kindle Store, Nook Store and Kobo Store are supported. 

Note: Amazon, Kindle, Kindle Fire, Kindle Store are all Amazon trademarks. Nook, B&N, Nook HD, Nook Store are all Barnes and Noble trademarks. They are only used to illustrate what this app is about. Kobo, kobobooks.com and related words, domain names and logos are trade-marks and the property of Kobo Inc. 

'Free Mystery Books' brings you the very best free mystery books every day - Get it now!
